languages.text: {n}Фактотум медлит, будто бы сомневаясь в том, что его слова достойны вашего внимания.{/n} "И еще кое-что, Лорд-капитан. Корабельные астропаты уловили эхо тревожных сообщений — в нескольких системах Простора были замечены неопознанные корабли, покинутые командой. Возможно, это всего лишь слухи, но те, кто повстречался с ними, бесследно пропали... На этом все, Ваша Светлость".

traits.locale_text: {n}Вигдис медлит, будто бы сомневаясь в том, что ее слова достойны вашего внимания.{/n} "И еще кое-что, Лорд-капитан. Корабельные астропаты уловили эхо тревожных сообщений — в нескольких системах Простора были замечены неопознанные корабли, покинутые командой. Возможно, это всего лишь слухи, но те, кто повстречался с ними, бесследно пропали... На этом все, Ваша Светлость".
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}The Factotum hesitates, as if unsure that what he has to say is worthy of your attention.{/n} "There is something else, Lord Captain. The ship's Astropaths have caught echoes of alarming messages. Unidentified ships abandoned by their crews have been spotted in several systems of the Expanse. It may only be a rumour, but those who encountered them have gone missing... That is all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Фактотум медлит, будто бы сомневаясь в том, что его слова достойны вашего внимания.{/n} "И еще кое-что, Лорд-капитан. Корабельные астропаты уловили эхо тревожных сообщений — в нескольких системах Простора были замечены неопознанные корабли, покинутые командой. Возможно, это всего лишь слухи, но те, кто повстречался с ними, бесследно пропали... На этом все, Ваша Светлость".

The ship's astropaths have caught echoes of alarming messages. Unidentified ships abandoned by their crews have been spotted in several Koronus systems. Perhaps it is only a rumour, but those who encountered them have gone missing without trace... That is all, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship."

The ship's Astropaths have caught echoes of alarming messages. Unidentified ships abandoned by their crews have been spotted in several systems of the Expanse. It may only be a rumour, but those who encountered them have gone missing... That is all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}高阶顾问犹豫了片刻，似乎不太确定接下来的事情该不该说。{/n}“还有一件事情，舰长大人。船上的星语者捕捉到了令人担忧的回声，说在科罗努斯扩区的多个星系内，都发现了遭到遗弃的不明舰船，所有遇到那些舰船的人都消失得无影无踪。不过，这或许仅仅是谣言而已……暂时没有其他情况了，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum hesitates, as if unsure that what he has to say is worthy of your attention.{/n} "There is something else, Lord Captain. The ship's Astropaths have caught echoes of alarming messages. Unidentified ships abandoned by their crews have been spotted in several systems of the Expanse. It may only be a rumour, but those who encountered them have gone missing... That is all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯犹豫了片刻，似乎不太确定接下来的事情该不该说。{/n}“还有一件事情，舰长大人。船上的星语者捕捉到了令人担忧的回声，说在科罗努斯扩区的多个星系内，都发现了遭到遗弃的不明舰船，所有遇到那些舰船的人都消失得无影无踪。不过，这或许仅仅是谣言而已……暂时没有其他情况了，大人。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Das Faktotum zögert, als sei er unsicher, ob sein Anliegen deiner Aufmerksamkeit würdig ist.{/n} "Es gibt noch etwas, Lord Captain. Die Astropathen des Schiffs haben Echos beunruhigender Nachrichten abgefangen. In verschiedenen Systemen der Ausdehnung wurden unbekannte Schiffe entdeckt, die von ihren Crews aufgegeben wurden. Es könnte sich nur um ein Gerücht handeln, doch wer sich diesen Schiffen genähert hat, soll spurlos verschwunden sein ... Das wäre alles, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum hesitates, as if unsure that what he has to say is worthy of your attention.{/n} "There is something else, Lord Captain. The ship's Astropaths have caught echoes of alarming messages. Unidentified ships abandoned by their crews have been spotted in several systems of the Expanse. It may only be a rumour, but those who encountered them have gone missing... That is all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis zögert, als sei sie unsicher, ob ihr Anliegen deiner Aufmerksamkeit würdig ist.{/n} "Es gibt noch etwas, Lord Captain. Die Astropathen des Schiffs haben Echos beunruhigender Nachrichten abgefangen. In verschiedenen Koronus-Systemen wurden unbekannte Schiffe entdeckt, die von ihren Crews aufgegeben wurden. Es könnte sich nur um ein Gerücht handeln, doch wer sich diesen Schiffen genähert hat, soll spurlos verschwunden sein ... Das ist alles, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}El Factótum titubea, como si dudase de que va a decir algo digno de tu atención.{/n} «Hay una cosa más, Lord Capitán. Los Astrópatas de la nave han captado los ecos de unos mensajes alarmantes. Varias naves no identificadas que fueron abandonadas por sus tripulaciones han sido divisadas en varios sistemas de la Extensión. Puede que se trate solo de un rumor, pero quienes se han tropezado con ellas han desaparecido... Eso es todo, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum hesitates, as if unsure that what he has to say is worthy of your attention.{/n} "There is something else, Lord Captain. The ship's Astropaths have caught echoes of alarming messages. Unidentified ships abandoned by their crews have been spotted in several systems of the Expanse. It may only be a rumour, but those who encountered them have gone missing... That is all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis titubea, como si dudase de que va a decir algo digno de tu atención.{/n} «Hay una cosa más, Lord Capitán. Los Astrópatas de la nave han captado los ecos de unos mensajes alarmantes. Varias naves no identificadas que fueron abandonadas por sus tripulaciones han sido divisadas en varios sistemas de Koronus. Puede que se trate solo de un rumor, pero quienes se han tropezado con ellas han desaparecido sin dejar rastro... Eso es todo, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Le factotum hésite, comme s'il n'était pas sûr que ce qu'il s'apprête à vous dire soit digne de votre attention.{/n} « Il y a autre chose, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les astropathes du vaisseau ont capté les échos de messages alarmants. Des vaisseaux non identifiés et déserts ont été repérés dans plusieurs systèmes des Étendues. Ce n'est peut-être qu'une rumeur, mais tous ceux qui ont croisé leur route auraient disparu... Voilà, vous savez tout, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum hesitates, as if unsure that what he has to say is worthy of your attention.{/n} "There is something else, Lord Captain. The ship's Astropaths have caught echoes of alarming messages. Unidentified ships abandoned by their crews have been spotted in several systems of the Expanse. It may only be a rumour, but those who encountered them have gone missing... That is all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis hésite, comme si elle n'était pas sûre que ce qu'elle s'apprête à vous dire soit digne de votre attention.{/n} « Il y a autre chose, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les astropathes du vaisseau ont capté les échos de messages alarmants. Des vaisseaux non identifiés et déserts ont été repérés dans plusieurs systèmes de Koronus. Ce n'est peut-être qu'une rumeur, mais tous ceux qui ont croisé leur route auraient disparu sans laisser de traces... Voilà tout, Votre Seigneurie. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}ファクトタムは、ためらいがちに、彼女の話があなたの注意を引くに値するかどうか確信が持てないかのように言う。{/n}「他にもあります、ロード・キャプテン。本艦の感応通信官が驚くべきメッセージのエコーをキャッチしました。乗組員に打ち捨てられた未確認船が、エクスパンスのいくつかの星系で目撃されています。噂に過ぎないかもしれませんが、船に遭遇した人々は行方不明になっています。以上です、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum hesitates, as if unsure that what he has to say is worthy of your attention.{/n} "There is something else, Lord Captain. The ship's Astropaths have caught echoes of alarming messages. Unidentified ships abandoned by their crews have been spotted in several systems of the Expanse. It may only be a rumour, but those who encountered them have gone missing... That is all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}ファクトタムは、ためらいがちに、彼女の話があなたの注意を引くに値するかどうか確信が持てないかのように言う。{/n}「他にもあります、ロード・キャプテン。本艦の感応通信官が驚くべきメッセージのエコーをキャッチしました。乗組員に打ち捨てられた未確認船が、エクスパンスのいくつかの星系で目撃されています。噂に過ぎないかもしれませんが、船に遭遇した人々は行方不明になっています。以上です、陛下」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: {n}Kâhya, söyleyeceklerinin senin dikkatine değer olup olmadığını ölçercesine tereddüt ediyor.{/n} "Bir şey daha vardı Lord Kaptan. Astropatlar, telaşa mahal veren bazı iletilerin yankılarını tespit etti. Enginlik'teki birkaç sistemde mürettebatlarınca terk edilmiş gemiler bulundu. Söylentiden ibaret olabilir ama bu gemilerle karşılaşanlar ortadan kayboluyormuş... Diyeceklerim bu kadar {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}The Factotum hesitates, as if unsure that what he has to say is worthy of your attention.{/n} "There is something else, Lord Captain. The ship's Astropaths have caught echoes of alarming messages. Unidentified ships abandoned by their crews have been spotted in several systems of the Expanse. It may only be a rumour, but those who encountered them have gone missing... That is all, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
